scripts.format: npm run format:check && npm run format:fix
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run predeploy && scripts/deploy.sh dev --app thrive-examiner --env .env.development --config ecosystem.config.js
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run predeploy && scripts/deploy.sh staging --app thrive-examiner --env .env.staging --config ecosystem.config.js
scripts.deploy:qa: npm run predeploy && scripts/deploy.sh qa --app thrive-examiner --env .env.qa --config ecosystem.config.js
scripts.deploy:production: npm run predeploy && scripts/deploy.sh production --app thrive-examiner --env .env.production --config ecosystem.config.js
scripts.docker:run: docker build -t examiner:latest . && docker run -p 3001:3001 examiner:latest
scripts.docker:dev:up: cross-env NODE_ENV=development sh -c '(docker compose version > /dev/null 2>&1 && docker compose up --build -d) || docker-compose up --build -d'
scripts.docker:dev:down: cross-env NODE_ENV=development sh -c '(docker compose version > /dev/null 2>&1 && docker compose down -v) || docker-compose down -v'
scripts.docker:staging:up: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging sh -c '(docker compose version > /dev/null 2>&1 && docker compose up --build -d) || docker-compose up --build -d'
scripts.docker:staging:down: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging sh -c '(docker compose version > /dev/null 2>&1 && docker compose down -v) || docker-compose down -v'
scripts.docker:prod:up: cross-env NODE_ENV=production sh -c '(docker compose version > /dev/null 2>&1 && docker compose up --build -d) || docker-compose up --build -d'
scripts.docker:prod:down: cross-env NODE_ENV=production sh -c '(docker compose version > /dev/null 2>&1 && docker compose down -v) || docker-compose down -v'
